title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.13 - Hearings; stipulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.13 - Hearings; stipulations

State Regulations

At a hearing, stipulations may be introduced in evidence
with respect to any issue, where such stipulation has been joined in by all
parties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
253.13

Renumbered from 253.38

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
